SA20vasbocpu:128_8: kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraścecchṛṇvantīdaṃ sūtraṃ labhante 'cintyamatītīkṣṇaṃ mahāprajñāvyūhamaprameyaṃ ca puṇyaphalavipākam /
SA20vasbocpu:128_9: tat kasya hetoḥ / idaṃ sūtraṃ vivṛṇotyaprameyaṃ supariśuddhaṃ prajñānennaṃ karoti buddhavijaṃ nirantaramanucchinnam /
SA20vasbocpu:128_16: chinatti lobhaṃ mātsaryaṃ śīlabhedaṃ dveṣaṃ kausīdyaṃ vikṣepaṃ mūḍhatāṃ (ca) ṣaḍ guruvyādhīn /
SA20vasbocpu:128_17: apanayati karmāvaraṇaṃ vipakāvaraṇaṃ kleśāvaraṇaṃ dṭaṣṭyāvaraṇamavidyāvaraṇaṃ jñānāvaraṇaṃbhāvānāvaraṇaṃ /
SA20vasbocpu:128_18: saṃkṣepata ucyate / idaṃ sūtraṃ nirvāpayati niravaśeṣaṃ sarvākuśaladharmān /
SA20vasbocpu:128_20: kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraścetsūtramidaṃ śrutvārocayantyanumodayantyāścaryacittamutpādayanti jñātavyaṃ taiḥ pūjitā aprameyā buddhāḥ /
SA20vasbocpu:128_22: tatkasya hetoḥ asya sūtrasya triṣvadhvasu buddhairācaritatvādyaḥ khalu (mārgā-)vacaraḥ śṛṇoti cedaṃ sūtraṃ svātmānaṃ dhanyaṃ manyate /
SA20vasbocpu:128_24: yaḥ kaścillikhatīdaṃ vācayatīdaṃ sūtraṃ jñātavyaṃ sa puruṣaḥ prāpnotyaprameyamaparyantaṃ puṇyaphalavipākam /
SA20vasbocpu:128_26: yadi kaścidavabudhyārthaṃ tathācarati yathā sarvabuddhairasaṃkhyeyeṣu kalpeṣvakṣayaprajñayā bhāṣitaṃ tasya puṇyaphalavipāko 'pyakṣayo bhavati /
SA20vasbocpu:128_27: yasminpradeśe dharmaśāstā deśayatīdaṃ sūtraṃ jñātavyaṃ tasminpradeśe stūpaḥ kārayitavyaḥ /
SA20vasbocpu:128_29: edaṃ sūtraṃ yasmindeśe nagarai grāme vihāre kuṭayāṃ vā bhavati jñātavyaṃ tatra bhavati [3 tathāgatasya] dharmakāyaḥ /
SA20vasbocpu:128_30_0: yadi puruṣaḥ pūjayati gandhapuṣpaiḥ saṃgītena vitānena camaracchatrairgītaiḥ stautrairnamaskāraiḥ jñātavyaṃ sa puruṣa buddhabījaṃ
SA20vasbocpu:128_30_1: bahulikaroti ki punarvaktavyaṃ yo niravaśeṣaṃ gṛhṇati dhārayati sūtramidam /
SA20vasbocpu:128_31: sa puruṣaḥ pūrayati puṇyaprajñāniṣpattimanāgate 'dhvani labhate vyākaraṇaṃ prāpnityanuttarāṃ samyaksambodhim /
